duties_responsibilities.duty: Hunting & closing new business while building existing business through increased interactions, touch points, and digital educational webinars.
Effectively managing and growing a defined sales territory with a sense of urgency.
Achieving quarterly and annual sales goals by closing new logos and working with current customers.
Overnight travel to meet with prospects and current customers.
Developing & growing long-term relationships with clients, prospects, and current customers.
Planning and participating in trade shows, exhibits, dinner programs, and other presentations.
Performing in-depth data analysis to develop targeted business plans for the territory.
Utilizing time management & organizational skills and managing expenses by accomplishing objectives within the budget.
Maintaining strong accountability for results and maintaining an attitude of excellence.
Being customer-focused and demonstrating teamwork with inclusiveness, mutual respect, ethics, and integrity.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent sales experience
